hadiths.text: Ibn Umar (Allah be pleased with them) reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:A woman should not set out on three (days' journey) except when she has a Mahram with her

chapter.ara-name: باب سَفَرِ الْمَرْأَةِ مَعَ مَحْرَمٍ إِلَى حَجٍّ وَغَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: A woman travelling with a Mahram for Hajj and other purposes
